item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for The Hartford Cooking And Recipes Meetup Group!

What: Why can't they all be California girls?

When: October 22, 2008 9:00 PM

Where: Click the link below to find out!

Meetup Description: Alina, a member of our MeetUp group would like to invite all
members (even those that she has not yet met) to her Graduation
and Bon Voyage social. Please attend! She will be moving back
to San Diego later this month. Details on the event:

Date: Wednesday, October 22nd
Time: 9pm to 11pm
(light jazz will begin at 10pm)

Location:
Tisane Tea & Coffee Bar
537 Farmington Ave
Hartford, CT 06105
Phone: (860) 523-5417

Alina's Cell Number: (619) 933-9277

Parking: If you do not park appropriately, you will be towed.
Please carefully review parking signs. If the lot is full, you
may park on the street or in the overflow lot (spots marked
with yellow brick behind the Kinkos across the street).

All are welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the bar having a Martini or a Mojito

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: ALINA'S GOOD BYE PARTY
